alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 8:36PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, BULLOCH, EFFINGHAM, CHATHAM, BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 835 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Groveland to near Bellinger Hill Area, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Pooler, Bluffton, Pembroke, I-16/I-95 Interchange, Bellinger Hill Area, Downtown Savannah, Godley Station, and Savannah International Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
